data.comment: The match is underway at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
Throw-in for Shonan at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Nagoya.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 10, Nagoya have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Mateus gives Nagoya a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Nagoya.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
Goal! Keisuke Saka (Shonan) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Nagoya.
In the minute 19, Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Shonan a goal kick.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 29, Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Nagoya are coming forward and Naoki Maeda gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 31, Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
Shonan to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 38, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Nagoya.
In Nagoya, Nagoya push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In Nagoya Nagoya attack through Mateus. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Shonan at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
At Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Can Nagoya capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Nagoya have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Koichiro Fukushima has blown to start the second-half.
In Nagoya, Hiroshi Ibusuki (Shonan) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
In the minute 47, Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Naoki Maeda of Nagoya smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Hiroyuki Abe.
In the minute 51, Naoki Maeda with an assist there.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Shonan, close to Nagoya's area.
Shonan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 53, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Shonan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nagoya move into a more comfortable 3-1 lead. Gabriel Xavier is the scorer with a header!
In the minute 55, Mateus instrumental with a fine assist.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Kazunari Ono is on a sub for Akimi Barada for Shonan.
The away team have replaced Hiroto Nakagawa with Yuto Iwasaki. This is the second substitution made today by Bin Ukishima.
In the minute 62, Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a third substitution, with Shota Kobayashi replacing Hiroshi Ibusuki.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Shonan a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 68, In Nagoya a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Massimo Ficcadenti is making the team's first substitution at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium with Yuki Soma replacing Hiroyuki Abe.
Koki Tachi (Shonan) has received a yellow card from Koichiro Fukushima.
Ball goes out of play for a Shonan goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
In Nagoya Nagoya drive forward through Gabriel Xavier. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Gabriel Xavier for Nagoya drives towards goal at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Shonan needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Nagoya.
Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in Shonan.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 79, Shumpei Naruse is replacing Gabriel Xavier for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Shonan drives forward and Shota Kobayashi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
In the minute 81, Sosuke Shibata is replacing Mitsuki Saito for Shonan at Nagoya Mizuho Athletics Stadium.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Shonan throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In Nagoya, Yuki Soma of Nagoya is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Nagoya.
In the minute 86, Koichiro Fukushima awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Free kick Shonan.
Shonan make their fifth substitution with Riuler replacing Koki Tachi.
In the minute 87, Corner awarded to Shonan.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Shonan's Riuler gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nagoya.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 3-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
